com.brightcove.omniture

Class CustomPlayerDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.primetime.va.PlayerDelegate
      • com.brightcove.omniture.CustomPlayerDelegate

  • public class CustomPlayerDelegate
extends com.adobe.primetime.va.PlayerDelegate
    Implementation of the extended PlayerDelegate abstract class required for Video Heartbeat integration. This is the only location to query video player APIs (BrightcoveVideoView) to gather data required by the video heartbeat library. TODO: fill out this class as we increase the ability to harvest this information from the BVV.
